verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David בִּהְיוֹת֖וֹ <WH1961> was in בַמְּעָרָ֣ה <WH4631> when he was in the cave תְפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> A Prayer ק֭וֹלִי <WH6963> with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶזְעָ֑ק <WH2199> I cried ק֝וֹלִ֗י <WH6963> with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶתְחַנָּֽן׃ <WH2603> did I make my supplication
אֶשְׁפֹּ֣ךְ <WH8210> I poured out לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before שִׂיחִ֑י <WH7879> my complaint צָ֝רָתִ֗י <WH6869> him my trouble לְפָנָ֥יו <WH6440> before אַגִּֽיד׃ <WH5046> him I shewed

בְּהִתְעַטֵּ֬ף <WH5848> was overwhelmed עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> within רוּחִ֗י <WH7307> When my spirit וְאַתָּה֮ <WH859> You יָדַ֪עְתָּ <WH3045> within me then thou knewest נְֽתִיבָ֫תִ֥י <WH5410> my path בְּאֹֽרַח־ <WH734> In the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> wherein אֲהַלֵּ֑ךְ <WH1980> I walked טָמְנ֖וּ <WH2934> have they privily laid פַ֣ח <WH6341> a snare לִֽי׃

הַבֵּ֤יט <WH5027> I looked יָמִ֨ין ׀ <WH3225> on [my] right hand וּרְאֵה֮ <WH7200> and beheld וְאֵֽין־ <WH369> there לִ֪י מַ֫כִּ֥יר <WH5234> but [there was] no man that would know אָבַ֣ד <WH6> failed מָנ֣וֹס <WH4498> me refuge מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at אֵ֖ין <WH369> is no דּוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> me no man cared לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> for my soul

זָעַ֥קְתִּי <WH2199> I cried אֵלֶ֗יךָ <WH413> to יְה֫וָ֥ה <WH3068> unto thee O LORD אָ֭מַרְתִּי <WH559> I said אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You מַחְסִ֑י <WH4268> Thou [art] my refuge חֶ֝לְקִ֗י <WH2506> [and] my portion בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַֽחַיִּים׃ <WH2416> of the living

הַקְשִׁ֤יבָה ׀ <WH7181> Attend אֶֽל־ <WH413> to רִנָּתִי֮ <WH7440> unto my cry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For דַלּ֪וֹתִ֫י <WH1809> low מְאֹ֥ד <WH3966> very הַצִּילֵ֥נִי <WH5337> deliver מֵרֹדְפַ֑י <WH7291> me from my persecutors כִּ֖י <WH3588> for אָמְצ֣וּ <WH553> for they are stronger מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> are too

ה֘וֹצִ֤יאָה <WH3318> Bring מִמַּסְגֵּ֨ר ׀ <WH4525> out of prison נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> my soul לְהוֹד֪וֹת <WH3034> that I may praise אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁ֫מֶ֥ךָ <WH8034> thy name בִּ֭י יַכְתִּ֣רוּ <WH3803> shall compass me about צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> the righteous כִּ֖י <WH3588> for תִגְמֹ֣ל <WH1580> for thou shalt deal bountifully עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and
